There are two types of points your firm can earn in this program: (1) "Status Points" are points that determine the membership tier your firm belongs to; and (2) "Cash Rewards Points" are points that determine the amount of cash rewards your firm earns. Points may be earned by purchasing eligible merchandise with your 1stDibs account (for your clients or yourself) on our website (the "Site") or by other actions as announced by 1stDibs. The program described in these Terms by which you earn Trade Rewards is referred to as the "Trade Rewards Program". The point at which you are entitled to a discrete benefit under the Trade Rewards Program is referred to as the "Reward Target Level".

In order to receive the Trade Rewards, you must agree to these Terms. The terms "you" and "your" refer to the entity which is agreeing to these Terms (and which either employs, is represented by, or is owned by, the individual person who is hereby agreeing to these Terms). As part of accepting these Terms, you must complete the online enrollment process (or you may call us and we will help you through the process) so that we have the information we need to enroll you in the Trade Rewards Program. The person agreeing to these Terms warrants (a) that he or she is at least 18 years old, (b) either works for, owns (in whole or part), or otherwise represents the entity for which he/she is signing; and (c) has all necessary rights to bind such entity (you) to these Terms. In addition, accepting a Trade Reward is deemed to be acceptance of these Terms.

Trade Rewards are only intended for and available to Professional Interior Designers and Architects who participate in the 1stDibs’ Trade Program ("Verified Designers"), a program including a suite of benefits for verified members of the trade. By agreeing to these Terms you represent and warrant to us that you are a Verified Designer.
1. General Requirements and Description.

(A) 1stDibs will provide a schedule of benefits associated with various points levels on its website at {link}. Details regarding how Status Points and Cash Rewards Points are earned, how rewards are determined, and the benefits of each membership tier are set forth on the Site at {link}, which is incorporated into these Terms by this reference.

(B) To avoid sending cash through the mail, the Trade Reward will be sent to you in the form of an American Express or Visa prepaid card (the "Trade Reward Cash Card" or "Cash Card"—the brand sent is at our option), which is redeemable for merchandise anywhere Amex or Visa prepaid cards are accepted, subject to any limitations imposed by Amex/Visa and by merchants. The Trade Reward Cash Card will be sent via US mail or a recognized delivery service/parcel carrier to the attention of the designated contact person at your firm, who is the person who enrolls you in the program (unless a different contact person is indicated on the enrollment form). However, if the designated contact person leaves your company, you should inform us and appoint a new contact person—points and Trade Rewards are intended for you (the entity) and not intended to be personal to the individual who executed these terms/was designated as contact person.

2. How Your Account Works.

(A) Enrollment Tier: Enrollment in Silver, Gold and Platinum tiers of Trade Rewards is based on earned Status Points from the prior calendar year (if you were a member of our Trade Rewards Program during that year) or Status Points earned in the current calendar year (whichever calculation would put you in the higher tier!). Your status increases at the time at which you achieve a higher tier level, on a going-forward basis: e.g., assume hypothetically that you spent enough with us as of July 23, 2018 to earn Gold tier (from Silver); in this case you would receive credit for the time you were Silver calculated at the Silver tier, and from July 24, 2018, you would receive credit calculated at the Gold Tier. Then, for the following year, you would remain no less than Gold tier, based on how the tiers are calculated.

(B) Timing of Sending Cash Cards: We will keep track of Cash Rewards Points you earn. We will send you a Trade Reward Cash Card after you reach a Reward Target Level, we will maintain a record of the Cash Rewards Points in excess of an applicable Reward Target Level that remain in your account, and we will mail you your next Trade Reward Cash Card after you achieve the next incremental Reward Target Level. In all cases, we have the right to send Cash Cards up to three (3) months after they are earned in order to allow appropriate processing time. You can view and track your account balance on {link}.

(C) Cash Rewards Points do not have any cash value unless and until you have reached a Reward Target Level while these Terms are still in effect and 1stDibs has converted such Cash Rewards Points into a Cash Card. If you do not achieve the next Reward Target Level at the time the Trade Rewards Program is terminated, your Cash Rewards Points will expire without any value. Your status increases at the time at which you achieve a higher tier level, on a going-forward basis: e.g., assume hypothetically that you spent enough with us as of July 23, 2019 to earn Gold tier (from Silver); in this case you would receive credit for the time you were Silver calculated at the Silver tier, and from July 24, 2019, you would receive credit calculated at the Gold Tier. Then, for the following year, you would remain no less than Gold tier, based on how the tiers are calculated. Enrollment in Bronze tier is based on earned Status Points in the current calendar year.

(B) Timing of Sending Cash Cards: We will keep track of Cash Rewards Points you earn. We will send you a Trade Reward Cash Card after you reach a Reward Target Level, we will maintain a record of the Cash Rewards Points in excess of an applicable Reward Target Level that remain in your account, and we will mail you your next Trade Reward Cash Card after you achieve the next incremental Reward Target Level. In all cases, we have the right to send Cash Cards up to three (3) months after they are earned in order to allow appropriate processing time. You can view and track your account balance on {link}.

(C) Cash Rewards Points do not have any cash value unless and until you have reached a Reward Target Level while these Terms are still in effect and 1stDibs has converted such Cash Rewards Points into a Cash Card. If you do not achieve the next Reward Target Level at the time the Trade Rewards Program is terminated, your Cash Rewards Points will expire without any value. You do not have a claim against us for any expired, terminated, invalidated or otherwise unusable Cash Rewards Points. Status Points and Cash Rewards Points accrued have no monetary value.
